p: EO from Cananga odorata (ylang-ylang EO, YYO) is usually used in reducing blood pressure, improving cognitive functioning in aromatherapy in humans. It was recently reported that YYO displayed anxiolytic effects on anxiety behaviors [ 63]. YYO and the three main constituents of YYO (benzyl benzoate, linalool, and benzyl alcohol) increased the time that mice visited the open arms and a lightbox area in the elevated plus-maze and light-dark box tests after acute and chronic YYO exposures [ 63]. YYO and its major constituent benzyl benzoate might act on the serotonergic and dopaminergic pathways [ 63].
